articles.description: The teaser of Sanya Malhotra starrer ‘Pagglait’ was dropped on the actress’ birthday on Thursday (February 25). The comedy is directed by Umesh Bist.  In the quirky teaser, Sanya is unable to express sorrow on the death of her husband.
